amendment.description: An amendment numbered 17 printed in House Report 117-125 to add the text of H.R. 577, the Colorado Outdoor Recreation and Economy Act, and H.R. 1052, the Grand Canyon Protection Act to the bill.
amendment.purpose: Amendment added the text of H.R. 577, the Colorado Outdoor Recreation and Economy Act, and H.R. 1052, the Grand Canyon Protection Act to the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Neguse amendment (A009) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 224 - 204 (Roll no. 274).

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A009) pursuant to the rule.
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Neguse amendment (A009) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 224 - 204 (Roll no. 274).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Neguse amendment (A009) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 224 - 204 (Roll no. 274).
